The unique strap design enables you to lock or release the bracket easily, and this tv wall mount has Anti-Drop design for safety. With long enough wall plate, you will have an easy adjustment for centering TV.

[𝗘𝗔𝗦𝗬 𝗧𝗢 𝗜𝗡𝗦𝗧𝗔𝗟𝗟]：Less than 30mins you need,the installation of this tv wall mount could be done easily and clearly with the instruction. Also comes with all the necessary screws, you could install it on the 16-24” wood studs /concrete wall /brick wall, but DO NOT install it on the drywall directly.

[𝗨𝗡𝗜𝗩𝗘𝗥𝗦𝗔𝗟 𝗧𝗩 𝗠𝗢𝗨𝗡𝗧]：Flush TV mount fits most of 42”-100", flat screen or curved OLED/LCD/LED/Plasma TVs. Fixed TV wall mount fits screens with Max VESA 800x600mm(31.5x23.6inch). It is best to check your TV VESA pattern, weight, studs spacing and possible blocked input before purchase.

[𝟭𝟬-𝗬𝗘𝗔𝗥 𝗙𝗥𝗜𝗘𝗡𝗗𝗟𝗬 𝗖𝗨𝗦𝗧𝗢𝗠𝗘𝗥 𝗦𝗘𝗥𝗩𝗜𝗖𝗘]：As an enterprise focusing on TV wall mount/brackets design innovation and production for 10 years, we have a professional after-sale team to offer you total solution every day. If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Product Feature Description HOME VISION heavy duty fixed TV wall mount fits most 42" to 100" flat curved screen TVs and supports TV weight up to 264lbs / 120kg.Low profile fixed TV mount can use with your existing TV, compatible with all major tv brands including SAMSUNG, SONY, LG, TCL, VIZIO, Hisense, SHARP, Toshiba, Panasonic, Philips, SKYWORTH and other LED, LCD OLED Plasma Flat Curved Screen TVs.And it fits VESA mounting hole patterns: 800x600/800x400/600x600/600x400/400x400/400x300/400x200/300x300/300x200/200x200. ( In inches:32"x24"/32"x16"/24"x24"/24"x16"/16"x16"/16"x12"/16"x8"/12"x12"/12"x8"/8"x8").Can be mounted on 16"/18"/24"/28" wood studs, concrete walls, and brick walls. NOT for drywall alone installation.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Outstanding Heavy Duty Fixed TV Wall Mount - Secure, Versatile, and Space-Saving!
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the Heavy Duty Fixed TV Wall Mount, and I am thoroughly impressed with its performance and reliability. This wall mount is an exceptional solution for securely mounting large, flat or curved TVs ranging from 42 to 100 inches. Allow me to share my experience with this outstanding product.First and foremost, the heavy-duty construction of this wall mount is outstanding. It is capable of supporting up to 264 pounds, providing a secure and sturdy foundation for my TV. The robust design ensures that my television remains safely in place, without any wobbling or risk of slippage. This level of durability and strength gives me peace of mind, knowing that my investment is well-protected.The versatility of this TV wall mount is noteworthy. It is compatible with a wide range of TV sizes, accommodating screens from 42 to 100 inches. The VESA compatibility of up to 800x600mm ensures that it fits most standard mounting patterns. Additionally, it is designed to fit 16-inch, 18-inch, and 24-inch studs, providing flexibility in installation options. This versatility makes it suitable for various room layouts and TV configurations.The low-profile design of this wall mount is a significant advantage. It allows my TV to sit close to the wall, creating a sleek and clean aesthetic. The space-saving feature is particularly beneficial for rooms with limited space or when I want to achieve a minimalist look. Despite the slim profile, the mount provides easy access to ports and cables, making adjustments and connections hassle-free.Installation of this wall mount was surprisingly straightforward. The package includes all the necessary hardware and clear instructions, making the process simple and efficient. The mount's design incorporates a leveling feature that ensures accurate positioning and alignment. The installation template provided further simplifies the process, minimizing any room for error. It's a user-friendly design that makes the installation experience smooth and hassle-free.Furthermore, the customer service provided by the seller is exceptional. They were responsive and attentive, addressing all my inquiries promptly. The packaging was secure, and the product arrived in perfect condition. Their commitment to customer satisfaction is evident, further reinforcing my confidence in their brand.In conclusion, the Heavy Duty Fixed TV Wall Mount is a top-notch choice for securely mounting large, flat or curved TVs. Its outstanding construction, versatile compatibility, low-profile design, and easy installation make it the ideal solution for creating a sleek and space-saving entertainment setup. I highly recommend this TV wall mount to anyone seeking a reliable and durable mounting solution. Choose this wall mount and enjoy the peace of mind that comes with a secure and stylishly mounted TV!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Robust stand for larger TV's
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this mount to install a TCL QM8 85" TV. The TV weighs 100 lbs, which is less than half the capacity of the mount. the mount came will all the hardware and spacers needed including several screw sizes to mount the TV, and four large lag bolts for the wall portion of the mount.There are plenty of slots and holes on both portions of the mount to adapt to a variety of TV's and wall stud locations.Even though the stand is not seen, the finish is very nice. There were no sharp corners, and the textured black paint is nice.This is a fixed wall mount stand, so don't expect a lot of access to the rear of the TV once it's mounted. I connected the wires beforehand and then installed the TV. You can pull the two release loops and pull the bottom of the TV away from the wall to provide about 6 inches of access.The mount is low profile, so it provides a nice final installation that's close the wall. Once installed, the TV feels very secure.As mounted, my TCL QM8 TV is canted very slightly forward. This is more a factor of the TV than the stand. I could correct this with the spacers provided, but chose to leave it as is since it's very slight and seems better directed at the viewing area.It's an excellent stand for the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very easy to install and supports our 80in tv
reviews.reviewText: To be honest it's a basic mount doesn't so anything fancy, but it mounts the TV to the wall. Hardware is very good quality washers needed to be a little bigger but I had some bigger ones lying around. Very satisfied with out purchase especially for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well built wall mount!
reviews.reviewText: I have been looking for a wall mount that would work on an older tv where the brackets are roughly 29” apart. After buying two different wall mounts which said they could support a tv up to 84” (mine is 65”) I realized that I needed a mount with a wider plate. This mount was l perfect and fit my tv. It’s built very well and can accommodate older TVs and support a heavier tv without a problem. It was everything I hoped for and would absolutely buy it again and recommend to anyone looking for a well built wall mount. It was also super easy to install, and I’m not exactly a guru when it comes to this type of thing. I had it installed in 15 minutes. It came with heavy duty bolts too. Thank you for accommodating what I needed!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy, easy to install, comes with level
reviews.reviewText: For the price...this is a steal.Very sturdy...easy to install, many holes in the back to adjust for 16 or 24 off center or directly to cement (my wall was 24 off center and also cement). 75 inch Sony TV on the wall...was very surprised at the quality and ease of installation...the level that it came with...cute and useful (eventhough I double checked against my own level).Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I used this to mount my 85" Samsung. Overall very sturdy and feels solid when mounted. It could take a lot more weight if needed. Not sure the studs could but the mount could. It is very low profile. That is what I wanted since my TV is mounted on a wall were you can see it from the side. I didn't want to see cables or anything. One side effect is it is too tight to plug cable in so do it as you mount it. Had to give it 4 out of 5 due to the only weak spot on the mount. The safety latches on the arms that keep it locked onto the wall mount could be better. They hold fine however the latch assembly are the only plastic parts. Held on by one little screw each and a plastic nub on the other end. It doesn't take much force at all to snap them off. Now this isn't going to make the tv fall but it wasn't too comforting. I ended up super gluing both in place. Even with that flaw I would probably buy it again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy wall mount for 85 inch TV
reviews.reviewText: Easy to install and good price!
